Text:
Uploaded by a Don Van Vleit fan. You have taste.
I have two of the albums.

It's worth the effort to listen to these classics
You either need to install itunes and quicktime, a pain as they takeup 50 meg or download
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3789443/MP4Converter_Soft_MP4_to_MP3_Converter_v3.0___Keygen
The guy who put this up is a Beefheart fan and that should tell you something.
Theres old grey and his sewing machine....... Great torrent a true gem! Thank You !

Hello Bat Chain Puller.
BTW : I'm a great Beefheart/Zappa fan, too.
But THE LIVERPOOL SCENE output is some of the BEST MUSIC ever made on planet earth!!!
So PLEASE PLEASE Seed !!!!
Thank you & best wishes,
Helmut from Germany

I have two of these as well. Saw them live twice. They deserve greater recognition. If I get this download I'll seed forever. If not I'll put my two up.

A squid eating dough in a polyethelene bag is vast and bulbous! got me
Brilliant. Some b@stard nicked my Bread On The Night 30 years ago! If it takes me another 30 years to download it I don't care. Mega cheers
